text:
Brookline, MA (Coolidge Corner) - Mobile Application Development

Raizlabs is a leading mobile development company based in Brookline, MA. Millions of users around the world use the applications that we’ve built for our clients, and we’re always looking for talented mobile developers (iOS and Android), designers and project managers to join our team.

We partner with companies, agencies and startups that believe mobile is bigger than just building an app.

Our mission is to help companies navigate the mobile space through strategy, user interface design and development services. Our collaborative process results in easy-to-use applications that deliver superior results. Raizlabs focuses on creating top-selling, award-winning products.

Find out more about Raizlabs at http://www.raizlabs.com. If interested, please submit a resume through our website.
